attributes.action: Re-instate 2030 deadline for ban on new gas & diesel cars
attributes.additional_details:
The prime minister's anti-green turn on Britain’s climate targets creates uncertainty, will deter investors, and puts the UK economically behind in creating future industries. 

Re-instating the ban on buying petrol and diesel cars by 2030 will help the UK re-instate a position of being at the forefront of climate policy and develop future industries to secure an economic future.
attributes.background: Re-instate the ban on buying petrol and diesel cars to 2030.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Keep the promise to ban diesel and petrol cars in 2030
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644662
